title: How to make my blog www.trendytech.com faster - Quora

response.answer_text: You can make your site faster following the steps described below. Buy a Dedicated Hosting > a VPS > Shared HostingUse a good theme that use light graphicsUse a good caching plugins like w3 total cache etc.Use google pagespeed insight to fix all the issues related to your site like gzipping, compression, minification, removing query var, leveraging browser caching etc etc.Use a good security plugin like sucuri or i theme security etc to scan your site for malware virus etc.Use less graphics in blog post and even if you use them, then compress them before uploading,Use a good CDN.Deactivate or Remove unnecessary plugins as much as possible.If you follow those 8 steps, your site should be very fast.
